Posts.Content: Hello, I’m taking  letrozol  about a month now. No big side effects as of yet except for an occasional hot flash. I wanted to take vitamins and my doctor approved me to take only vitamin D3 and calcium. I ordered my vitamins but I see it also includes some vitamin C and boron. Haven’t contacted my doctor yet, but is it safe to take those two other elements within the vitamin?
Posts.Title: Letrozol and vitamins
